SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) AS N from :6/invo inner join :6/cflc on INVO_ADMNO=CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED and INVO_CLNTNO=CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED where CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and CFLC_USRID=':3'and invo_aactuali:4 and invo_debc_no=:5
